name: New Year's Day
impact_note: Heavy leisure travel; early-morning/late-night banks often full.

name: Super Bowl LVIII
impact_note: Las Vegas focus (LAS) with spill to PHX/LAX/DFW; inbound peak Fri-Sat and outbound Mon.

name: Presidents' Day
impact_note: Ski and school-break travel surge across the week.

name: Labor Day Friday
impact_note: Outbound peak for Labor Day weekend.

name: Thanksgiving Eve
impact_note: Busiest outbound day; hub congestion nationwide.

name: Thanksgiving Day
impact_note: Reduced schedules; morning weather issues can cascade.

name: Christmas Day
impact_note: Reduced schedule; limited recovery if weather hits.
